section.name: Configuration backup and restore
section.p: Here, describes Fess information backup and restore methods.

subsection.name: How to set up
subsection.p: In Administrator account after logging in, click the menu backup and restore.

subsection.name: Backup settings
subsection.p: Click the download link and Fess information output in XML format. Saved settings information is below.
In the SOLR index data and data being crawled is not backed up. Those data can Fess setting information to crawl after the restore, regenerate.

subsection.name: Restore settings
subsection.p: You can restore the configuration information by uploading the XML outputted by the backup. Specify the XML file, click the restore button on the data.
If there is already to enable overwriting of data, the same data does update existing data.
